mapper.select: SELECT imsProduct.src, imsProducts.num_iid, imsProducts.code, pi.image_name, cmsProducts.url_key, b.description FROM (SELECT item.code src, beat.channel_id, beat.cart_id, p.num_iid FROM voyageone_ims.ims_bt_beat beat JOIN voyageone_ims.ims_bt_beat_item_temp item ON beat.beat_id = item.beat_id JOIN voyageone_ims.ims_bt_product p ON item.code = p.code AND beat.channel_id = p.channel_id AND beat.cart_id = p.cart_id WHERE beat.beat_id = #{beat_id} AND beat.end < #{now}) imsProduct LEFT JOIN voyageone_ims.ims_bt_product imsProducts ON imsProduct.cart_id = imsProducts.cart_id AND imsProduct.channel_id = imsProducts.channel_id AND imsProduct.num_iid = imsProducts.num_iid AND imsProducts.main_product_flg = 1 LEFT JOIN voyageone_cms.cms_bt_product cmsProducts ON imsProducts.code = cmsProducts.code AND imsProducts.channel_id = cmsProducts.channel_id LEFT JOIN voyageone_cms.cms_bt_product_image pi ON pi.product_id = cmsProducts.product_id AND pi.image_type_id = 1 AND pi.image_id = 1

SELECT temp.num_iid src, imsProducts.num_iid, imsProducts.code, pi.image_name, cmsProducts.url_key, b.description FROM voyageone_ims.ims_bt_beat beat JOIN voyageone_ims.ims_bt_beat_item_temp temp ON beat.beat_id = temp.beat_id LEFT JOIN voyageone_ims.ims_bt_product imsProducts ON beat.cart_id = imsProducts.cart_id AND beat.channel_id = imsProducts.channel_id AND temp.num_iid = imsProducts.num_iid AND imsProducts.main_product_flg = 1 LEFT JOIN voyageone_cms.cms_bt_product cmsProducts ON imsProducts.code = cmsProducts.code AND imsProducts.channel_id = cmsProducts.channel_id LEFT JOIN voyageone_cms.cms_bt_product_image pi ON pi.product_id = cmsProducts.product_id AND pi.image_type_id = 1 AND pi.image_id = 1 WHERE beat.beat_id = #{beat_id} AND beat.end < #{now}
